ISSUE.TITLE: [i18n] Language support extension- es
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # i18n translation request 1. Select applicalbe - [ ] **New language support request** - [x] **Existing language translation corrections request** Verify if language support already exists in the NocoDB i18n master spreadsheet [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1kGp92yLwhs1l7lwwgeor3oN1dFl7JZWuQOa4WSeZ0TE/edit#gid=2076107172) 2. Associated language code (pick from [here](https://developers.google.com/admin-sdk/directory/v1/languages)): es 3. Google spreadsheet - [ ] **Attached** - [x] **Shared link**: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/11Jup_j4mK81HZgmCLmxJkAWUl6B6Palkr6PwR7Fvj24/edit 5. Summary of the changes made Multiple reviews of all Spanish translation 6. Any specific message to be conveyed to moderators? Thank you!

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: chore: i18n translations-nl (TsjipTsjip) Signed-off-by: Raju Udava <86527202+dstala@users.noreply.github.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: chore: i18n translations- es (FerLSanchez) Signed-off-by: Raju Udava <86527202+dstala@users.noreply.github.com>
